name: itzat
overview:
itzat is a fresh approach to the nightlife brought to you by Austin Social Innovation LLC. itzat was developed to deliver an effective marketing tool for nightlife brands and businesses which:

  1. Provides meaningful interaction with itzat customers
  2. Produces real-time updates for a constantly evolving market
  3. Tracks user data in relation to nightlife brands and business
  4. Offers a flexible platform to promote a businesses true brand and culture

itzat does this by giving users access to a mobile application loaded with unique, fresh and up-to-date content which helps them navigate the nightlife landscape and make informed decisions on what to do. itzat gives businesses access to a simple web portal which provides them with customizable event and brand management to help funnel itzat’s users their way.

The following is a snapshot of the itzat product suite:

Portal: itzat’s online portal allows businesses to create, promote and manage events associated with their brand. It also tracks all of itzat’s users’ engagement with their brand and events giving them critical data to help make informed marketing decisions.

BarGoggles: itzat’s augmented-reality driven BarGoggles gives users an inside look into the happenings of the nightlife through the lens of their phone and make real-time decisions on where and how to spend their money.

News: The itzat “News” section is a one-stop-shop for everything that is happening in any given city on any given night.

Cards/Memberships: itzat gives businesses and brands the opportunity to create Offer, Loyalty and VIP cards to be distributed or sold to its users right through the mobile platform. These cards allow businesses to monetize and track the engagement of specific customers as well as securely validate card benefits and entry to events.

itzat is backed by the experienced and talented media company NAKA Media and a strong list of influential and well connected advisers. itzat’s goal is to become the number one player in the nightlife social sphere and the go-to brand for businesses and consumers alike.
